items.sentence: I don\'t know whether to believe you or not.
I don\'t speak French as often as I used to.
Tom doesn\'t think you\'re going to do that.
Tom doesn\'t understand what you\'re saying.
Where were you? Everyone is looking for you.
Which do you like better, Boston or Chicago?
The police officer removed Tom\'s handcuffs.
Tom said he wanted to try riding a unicycle.
Tom has been living here since he was a kid.
Tom has been living in Boston since October.
Tom has been told about the problem already.
Did you watch the soccer game on television?
Everybody knew she could speak English well.
Have you had your eyesight checked recently?
Tom didn\'t give me what he was supposed to.
Tom didn\'t go because Mary told him not to.
Tom didn\'t have any idea what he should do.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to rent a car.
Tom didn\'t have enough strength to do that.
Tom didn\'t have time to watch TV yesterday.
